thread.title: 19 Undeniable Signs You Went To High School In A Small Town
thread.title_full: 19 Undeniable Signs You Went To High School In A Small Town

author: Pablo Valdivia, Krista Torres
title: 19 Undeniable Signs You Went To High School In A Small Town
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @Ballermom64 ID: 10587129 2. Your teachers also always doubled as your coaches. View this image › 
Twitter: @megdennis713 ID: 10587156 3. Your field trips were usually underwhelming and five minutes away from your school. View this image › 
aprilnicole56 / Via instagram.com ID: 10587539 4. You probably dated one of your friend’s exes because your options were limited. View this image › 
Paramount ID: 10587165 5. Your idea of hanging out was probably loitering in a parking lot or in some field. View this image › 
Twitter: @SmallTwnProbs ID: 10587280 6. But you couldn’t hang out TOO late because your town had a curfew for minors. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10587256 7. You were forced to sell World’s Finest Chocolate bars for literally any school event. View this image › 
dalmationsme / Via instagram.com ID: 10587538 8. You were probably late to school once or twice because you got stuck behind a damn tractor. View this image › 
Twitter: @carrieshavonne ID: 10587217 9. Every Friday night was dedicated to sports, whether you liked it or not. View this image › 
Twitter: @AlyssaWaters23 ID: 10587322 10. And every sporting event always made headline news in your local paper. View this image › 
Twitter: @Smith11Majay ID: 10587250 11. If you wanted new clothes for school, you had to travel a MINIMUM of 30 minutes to find the nearest mall. View this image › 
Pablo Valdivia ID: 10587288 12. And the parking lot was always full of pick-up trucks. View this image › 
98_lope / Via instagram.com ID: 10587259 13. Chances are you or someone you knew was in FFA or 4H. View this image › 
nimat79 / Via instagram.com FFA=Future Farmer’s of America
ID: 10587485 14. And if you wanted to go on a date with that hot person from class, chances are you went to Dairy Queen or Sonic. View this image › 
shopsouthernhippie / Via instagram.com ID: 10587524 15. You quickly realized your teachers had a life outside of school because you ran into them often. View this image › 
Paramount ID: 10587655 16. You spent the majority of your time outside of school just cruising and doing stupid shit around town. View this image › 
colerexx / Via instagram.com ID: 10587706 17. The rodeo and county fair were the most talked about events at your school. View this image › 
jnshaumeyer / Via instagram.com ID: 10587710 18. You heard the “horse to school” joke at least a million times from big city folks. View this image › 
Twitter: @definitelytexan ID: 10587719 19. But that’s because they just don’t understand how awesome your high school experience truly was. View this image › 
amy.28.kate / Via instagram.com ID: 10587729
